issue.title: [JS] Browser bundles broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14492](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14492). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The package.json file should use paths for the `browser` mapping instead of just the file names. As it stands right now, one cannot create browser bundlers with arrow in it.
